programme.title: Running Mates and Carpet Baggers
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke explains the origins of the American political phrase "running mate".
programme.medium_synopsis: Alistair Cooke explains the origins of the American political phrases "carpet bagger" and "running mate" as well as the role of the vice president.
